EmailTemplate.subject: Weather Information Service Update 1.2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Email Title We’ve updated the Weather Information Service (WIS) to be more user-friendly and display an even greater level of detail in weather data, allowing you to strategically flight plan around unwanted or potentially dangerous weather phenomena.
New features in the WIS app include:
- Automatic selection of data tiles based on your flight plan–reducing the amount of data you need to download - An increased level of detail in satellite weather data, including weather levels and highlighting of weather phenomena - Inclusion of PIREPs on the weather display - One-click centering of the map to your ownship position - Bug fixes and usability improvements
